DESCRIPTION: The correct domain for this property will be added to class type of the subject map
The current language tag value will be replaced by a valid language tag you choose
The parent column you enter will be added
The child column you enter will be added
The property you enter will replace the current property
Defined properties within the same namespace will be retrieved and can be selected
Defined classes within the same namespace will be retrieved and can be selected
The class value you select will be removed
The current class value will be replaced by the new class value you enter
The current term type can be replaced by a valid term type
The current term type can be removed
The correct datatype will be fetched and replaced by the current datatype
The datatype entered will replace the current datatype
The language tag will be removed
The current URI will be replaced by the new URI you enter
Manaul refinements are completed by you using a text editor
